channel.title: Help. pl0x
channel.description: ok well i just got a new comp so i am needing help with this stuff again... ok i got my java and the classpath stuff done. but... when i compile or run my server i get this. [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue...[/code] any1 know wat to do?

item.title: Help. pl0x
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

they are the same as every tut i looked threw for them. i got it up atm.

classpath CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

path C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
so?
i have jdk 6u7.
[size=18pt]NVM IT HAS BEEN FIXED!! I CHANGED THE _01 TO _07! LOL!!![/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Help. pl0x

item.description:
@i_lured_i wrote:

Somthing might be wrong with your Enviromental Variables, check them over.
